actions.text: Committee on Finance ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Finance. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Bentsen. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 442.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to provide for the restoration of certain trade benefits for Panama.

summary.text: Declares that a certain certification by the President under the Narcotics Control Trade Act relating to efforts by Panama to control drug trafficking shall be deemed satisfied and that certain trade benefits under the Generalized System of Preferences and the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act shall be restored to its products.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the restoration of certain trade benefits for Panama.
